pageContext.claim: ““John Brennan, no single figure in American history has done more to discredit the intelligence community than this liar. Not only is he a liar, he’s a liar about being a liar.”  Dan Bongino on @foxandfriends”
pageContext.analysis: There's no evidence to suggest that former-CIA director John Brennan has done anything to discredit the intelligence community. Rather, he regularly refers to official reports from intelligence officials.
